CREATE TABLE [parquet_poolv2] (
	[Correlationid] nvarchar(4000),
	[Operationname] nvarchar(4000),
	[Status] nvarchar(4000),
	[Eventcategory] nvarchar(4000),
	[Level] nvarchar(4000),
	[Time] nvarchar(4000),
	[Subscription] nvarchar(4000),
	[Eventinitiatedby] nvarchar(4000),
	[Resourcetype] nvarchar(4000),
	[Resourcegroup] nvarchar(4000),
	[Resource] nvarchar(4000)
	)

copy into [parquet_poolv2] from 'https://datalakedemodp203.blob.core.windows.net/parquet'
with (
        file_type = 'parquet',
        CREDENTIAL=(IDENTITY='Storage Account Key', SECRET='aTVPvtKPOE2ZdZm8o2uCG42KJM93qYnySCktFMb5TEjQiNbAoTf35s1Ha1ATgAg12cPbXxki7In++AStaTR/Uw==')
)

SELECT * FROM [parquet_poolv2]
